feed.title: deephackmode.io
feed.subtitle: This blog site contains random articles about technology and other stuff.

entry.title: Welcome to deephackmode.io!
entry.content:
Welcome to deephackmode.io!

This is my first blog post. I intend to post random articles about my work-related experiences, trainings, homelab and other things. My primary goal is to document the details of what I encountered and have learned, so that I could recall them when I need to. In that way, they wonâ€™t be lost forever in oblivion. Hopefully, along the way, someone would find at least one of them to be slightly useful.
